thread.title: Wonderful! - Review
thread.title_full: Wonderful! - Review of Boro Hotel, Long Island City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Lizzy1920
title: Wonderful! - Review
text:
From start to finish, everything was wonderful about our stay at the Boro Hotel in Long Island City. The beds were beyond comfortable and the view of the Manhattan skyline could not be beat. Our breakfast with room service was delicious and the staff were extremely helpful and polite. The hotel itself is unique with a contemporary theme, spotlessly clean and conveniently located. We loved it!
Room Tip: Ask for a room with a view of Manhattan. See more room tips
